Value.label: On/Off Status Recovery After Power Failure
Value.Help: Status after Power Failure

Value.label: Power Wattage Report Value Threshold
Value.Help: 0 = power meter disabled; 1-65535 = value in watts for report threshold

Value.label: Power Wattage Report Frequency
Value.Help: 0 = disabled; 30-2678400 = time in seconds to send power wattage report

Value.label: Energy (kWh) Report Frequency
Value.Help: 0 = disabled; 30-2678400 = time in seconds to send energy report

Value.label: Overload Protection
Value.Help: 0 = disabled; 1-1800 = value in watts for overload protection

Value.label: Enable/Disable Auto Turn-Off Timer for CH1
Value.Help: Enable or Disable auto turn-off timer for CH1

Value.label: Set Auto Turn-Off Timer for CH1
Value.Help: Value in minutes for auto-off timer for CH1, if enabled

Value.label: Enable/Disable Auto Turn-On Timer for CH1
Value.Help: Enable or Disable auto turn-off timer for CH1

Value.label: Set Auto Turn-On Timer for CH1
Value.Help: Value in minutes for auto-on timer for CH1, if enabled

Value.label: Enable/Disable Auto Turn-Off Timer for CH2
Value.Help: Enable or Disable auto turn-off timer for CH2

Value.label: Set Auto Turn-Off Timer for CH2
Value.Help: Value in minutes for auto-off timer for CH2, if enabled

Value.label: Enable/Disable Auto Turn-On Timer for CH2
Value.Help: Enable or Disable auto turn-off timer for CH2

Value.label: Set Auto Turn-On Timer for CH2
Value.Help: Value in minutes for auto-on timer for CH2, if enabled

Value.label: Enable/Disable Auto Turn-Off Timer for CH3
Value.Help: Enable or Disable auto turn-off timer for CH3

Value.label: Set Auto Turn-Off Timer for CH3
Value.Help: Value in minutes for auto-off timer for CH3, if enabled

Value.label: Enable/Disable Auto Turn-On Timer for CH3
Value.Help: Enable or Disable auto turn-off timer for CH3

Value.label: Set Auto Turn-On Timer for CH3
Value.Help: Value in minutes for auto-on timer for CH3, if enabled

Value.label: Enable/Disable Auto Turn-Off Timer for CH4
Value.Help: Enable or Disable auto turn-off timer for CH4

Value.label: Set Auto Turn-Off Timer for CH4
Value.Help: Value in minutes for auto-off timer for CH4, if enabled

Value.label: Enable/Disable Auto Turn-On Timer for CH4
Value.Help: Enable or Disable auto turn-off timer for CH4

Value.label: Set Auto Turn-On Timer for CH4
Value.Help: Value in minutes for auto-on timer for CH4, if enabled

Value.label: Enable/Disable Auto Turn-Off Timer for CH5
Value.Help: Enable or Disable auto turn-off timer for CH5

Value.label: Set Auto Turn-Off Timer for CH5
Value.Help: Value in minutes for auto-off timer for CH5, if enabled

Value.label: Enable/Disable Auto Turn-On Timer for CH5
Value.Help: Enable or Disable auto turn-off timer for CH5

Value.label: Set Auto Turn-On Timer for CH5
Value.Help: Value in minutes for auto-on timer for CH5, if enabled

Value.label: Enable/Disable Manual Control
Value.Help: Enable or Disable Manual Controll for out Outlets

Value.label: LED Indicator Mode
Value.Help: Normal = LED indicator is on when power is on, off when power is off. Inverse = LED indicator is off when power is on, and on when power is off. Always Off = LED indicator is always off, regardless of power status.
